data.comment: The match has started at Neo Quimica Arena.
Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 1, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Leo Natel for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corinthians's Leo Natel is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leo Natel of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Corinthians drive forward through Leo Natel. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 13, Raphael Claus signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 15, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 18, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Corinthians surge into the attack at Neo Quimica Arena but Fabio Santosâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Brenner (Sao Paulo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 25, Corinthians take a 1-0 lead thanks to Romulo Otero.
Great play from Victor Cantillo to set up the goal.
Brenner (Sao Paulo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 28, Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 30, Raphael Claus awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Corinthians's Romulo Otero misses with an attempt on goal.
Raphael Claus awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 34, Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Sao Paulo's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Corinthians's area.
Leo Natel for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 39, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Luciano Da Rocha is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 41, Corinthians make their first substitution with Guilherme Camacho replacing Victor Cantillo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Luciano Da Rocha looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 43, Luciano Da Rocha for the away team is judged to be offside.
Luciano Da Rocha, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Pablo Felipe is the substitute for Sao Paulo.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
In the minute 45, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians's Fagner is on target but unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Sao Paulo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Tche Tche is on a sub for Bruno Alves for Sao Paulo.
The away team replace Juanfran with Igor Vinicius.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 50, Raphael Claus signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo drives forward and Igor Gomes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 51, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Raphael Claus.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 58, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Ramiro's finish is wide of the goal.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Corinthians.
Raphael Claus signals a Corinthians throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 62, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Leo Natel.
It seems as if Leo Natel is unable to continue. Gustavo Da Silva replaces him for the home team.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 64, Corinthians's Romulo Otero breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 66, Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets in a shot on goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Reinaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Sao Paulo's Pablo Felipe is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Gustavo Da Silva of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 72, Raphael Claus awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo, Tche Tche of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 78, Tche Tche (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Brenner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Corinthians defender.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Juan Cazares with Luan. This is the third substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
Vagner Mancini is making the team's fourth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Lucas Piton Crivellaro replacing Romulo Otero.
Vagner Mancini (Corinthians) is making a fifth substitution, with Mateus Vital replacing Ramiro.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 80, Hernanes is replacing Igor Gomes for the away team.
Vitor Bueno is replacing Brenner for Sao Paulo at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 81, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo drive forward through Vitor Bueno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 84, Raphael Claus signals a Corinthians throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Corinthians's Luan gets in a shot on goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Robert Arboleda (Sao Paulo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Sao Paulo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Corinthians's Luan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Raphael Claus awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Dani Alves. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Corinthians push forward at Neo Quimica Arena and Gustavo Da Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Neo Quimica Arena. The final score is 1-0.
